alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 9:05PM MST until July 16 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 904 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Palo Verde, or near Buckeye, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Buckeye, Palo Verde, Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station, Hassayampa and Arlington. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 100 and 117. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 143 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
